name: Tower Defense (Heroic)
description:
This is a Tower Defense game from a tutorial book I'm working on to learn C++ and game programming. While it's not my creation, the project was useful for learning class based design, pathfinding, and using itch.io. I did at the very least type through all the author's original code to understand it through transcription. I did a little re-working of code by myself and I think I learned something and that's the point.

How to run the game

  • Compile using GCC

How to play the game

  • Click a tile on the map.
  • Press "B" to build a tower
